name: Restaurant Hunter
tagline: Find the best restaurant in a glimpse
body:
Introduction
============
Restaurant Hunter is a data visualization tool for [Yelp Dataset Challenge](http://www.yelp.com/dataset_challenge). This tool helps users to easily find best restaurants in an area.

![Overview](./imgs/main.png)

Features
========
Color scaled markers on the map.
![Color Scaled Markers](./imgs/map.png)

A scatter plot of average stars vs weighted stars of selected area.
![Average stars vs Weighted stars](./imgs/stars.png)

Linked view between scatter plot and map.
![Linked View](./imgs/linked_view.png)

The whole history of reviews.
![Review History](./imgs/review_history.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
